This science fiction movie tells the story of a large earthship that carries 20 million people from Earth to a new planet called Titan in search of a habitable environment for humans. The movie has an outstanding cast including Anthony Daniels, Kenny Baker, Harrison Ford and a well-written script by David S. Goyer and Larry Shillinger.

Based on your preference cues, I would recommend "The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou" (2004) directed by Steven Spielberg.
This movie follows the adventures of oceanographer Steve Zissou (played by Bill Murray)) who is seeking revenge against a legendary shark that killed his partner. Along the way, Steve teams up with a journalist, a man who may or may not be his son, and others to survive various challenges.
Overall, "The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou" (2004) directed by Steven Spielberg is an entertaining and thought-provoking movie that explores themes of revenge, acceptance, and the meaning of life.
